title: The Definitive Batman Comics Collection (.cbz, .cbr files)
description:
This massive collection contains every regular series issue DC's 'Batman' from 1940's issue #1 on up to 2010, as well as:

- Annuals
- Batman - Year One
- Frank Miller's The Dark Knight Returns
- A Death in the Family
- The Killing Joke
- Batman - Black and White
- The Long Halloween
- Batman Chronicles
- Batman - The Dark Knight
- Batman Beyond
- Batman Eternal
- Batman - The Return of Bruce Wayne
- Batman Incorporated
- Marvel Crossovers
-- Batman vs The Incredible Hulk
-- Batman and Captain America
-- Bruce Wayne Agent of SHIELD
-- Batman and Spiderman - New Age Dawning
-- Daredevil and Batman - Eye for an Eye
-- Barman Daredevil - Kings of New York
- And much, much more

All issues are in either .cbz or .cbr format. I had to .rar the directory because the file paths were too long to create the torrent. If you wanted to pick and choose issues, I apologize for the inconvenience.

Cheers!
